segments.text: Rich ! I ’ m glad I caught you . Mr . Carlton ’ s just come over here from the main office .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: He needs to see the two of us to talk about next week ’ s annual sales meeting .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I haven ’ t got two minutes at the moment . Can ’ t you go over things without me ?
segments.speaker: S2
